title: Email address seems broken
body:
I tried to email the address from the `README.md`:
kat@krasch.dev

And got the responses:
```
The response from the remote server was:

554 5.7.1 : Relay access denied 
```

```
kat@krasch.dev
asp-relay.et.namecheap.tech
Remote server returned '550 5.7.367 Remote server returned not permitted to relay -> 554 5.7.1 <kat@krasch.dev>: Relay access denied'
````
author: Mercotui

comments.body: Ooops, sorry, this should be fixed now, could you try again? Thanks for letting me know!
I've tried to send it again üôè

title: Fix english translation of german welcome message
author: petterarvidsson

title: Use npm's convention for running tests and scripts
body:
Thank you for this tool, @krasch üôá 

While starting it locally, I noticed this typo in the ReadMe. This correction also aligns instrucitons and the workflow commands with what  `npm --help` suggests.
author: katrinleinweber
